sn14.27:1: At Sāvatthī.sn.ii.68"Bhikkhus, it is by way of elements that beings come together and unite. Those who destroy life come together and unite with those who destroy life; those …as above, continuing:… who are covetous … who bear ill will … of wrong view come together and unite with those of wrong view.
sn14.27:2: "Those who abstain from the destruction of life …as above… who are uncovetous … without ill will … of right view come together and unite with those of right view."
